// ProjectService - API for projects and warehouse zones
import axios from'axios';const API_BASE='/api/projects';const projectService={async getProjects(){let params=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:{};const response=await axios.get(API_BASE,{params});return response.data;},async getZones(projectId){if(!projectId)return{zones:[]};const response=await axios.get("".concat(API_BASE,"/").concat(projectId,"/zones"));return response.data;}};export default projectService;
